short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a get request to the current url and reloads the page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This browser extension adds a get request to the current url and reloads the page.
What? On clicking on the extensions button this extension will add whatever you provided in the extensions settings. The default value is: xmlonly=true
